Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/105th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/105th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Halsted/105th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kosmensky
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Cicero, 63rd, Pulaski. 59th then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 59th/Kosmensky.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Cicero, 63rd, Pulaski. 59th then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 59th/Kosmensky.

Allow extra travel time.
